languages.text: Уделяя сну и пище лишь несколько часов в день, Вольный Торговец трудил{mf|ся|ась} во имя угнетенных, не подвластн{mf|ый|ая} усталости и бремени лет. Но, спустя годы, странные слухи поползли о {mf|нем|ней}. Якобы не каждый, кто входил во врата дворца на Даргонусе, выходил из них. Завистники клеветали, что с возрастом {name} обрел{mf||а} "вкус к невинности" и наслаждал{mf|ся|ась} плотью оскорбленных и беззащитных.

Sparing just a few hours a day for sleep and food, the Rogue Trader worked for the benefit of the downtrodden, not affected by exhaustion or the burden of {mf|his|her} years. Yet, with time, strange rumours began to spread. It was said that not everyone who entered the gates of {mf|his|her} palace on Dargonus would leave again. Envious slander claimed that {name} had acquired a "taste for innocence" in {mf|his|her} later years, and that {mf|he|she} enjoyed consuming the flesh of defenceless victims.
languages.original_text: Уделяя сну и пище лишь несколько часов в день, Вольный Торговец трудил{mf|ся|ась} во имя угнетенных, не подвластн{mf|ый|ая} усталости и бремени лет. Но, спустя годы, странные слухи поползли о {mf|нем|ней}. Якобы не каждый, кто входил во врата дворца на Даргонусе, выходил из них. Завистники клеветали, что с возрастом {name} обрел{mf||а} "вкус к невинности" и наслаждал{mf|ся|ась} плотью оскорбленных и беззащитных.

traits.locale_text: Sparing just a few hours a day for sleep and food, the Rogue Trader worked for the benefit of the downtrodden, not affected by exhaustion or the burden of years. Yet, years later, strange rumours started spreading. Allegedly, not every person, who entered the gates of {mf|his|her} palace on Dargonus, exited later. Envious people slandered {name}, saying that with age {mf|he|she} acquired a "taste for innocence", and enjoyed the taste of the flesh of those insulted and defenseless.

Sparing just a few hours a day for sleep and food, the Rogue Trader worked for the benefit of the downtrodden, not affected by exhaustion or the burden of years. Yet, years later, strange rumours started spreading. Allegedly, not every person, who entered the gates of {mf|his|her} palace on Dargonus, exited later. Envious people slandered {name}, saying that with age {mf|he|she} acquired a "taste for innocence", and enjoyed the taste of the flesh of those insulted and defenseless.

Sparing just a few hours a day for sleep and food, the Rogue Trader worked for the benefit of the downtrodden, not affected by exhaustion or the burden of years. Yet, with time, strange rumours began spreading. Allegedly, not everyone who entered the gates of {mf|his|her} palace on Dargonus would exit. People enviously slandered {name}, saying that with age {mf|he|she} had acquired a "taste for innocence," and enjoyed consuming the flesh of defenceless victims.

Sparing just a few hours a day for sleep and food, the Rogue Trader worked for the benefit of the downtrodden, not affected by exhaustion or the burden of years. Yet, with time, strange rumours began spreading. Allegedly, not everyone who entered the gates of {mf|his|her} palace on Dargonus would exit. People enviously slandered {name}, saying that with age {mf|he|she} had acquired a "taste for innocence," and enjoyed consuming the flesh of defenceless victims.

Sparing just a few hours a day for sleep and food, the Rogue Trader worked for the benefit of the downtrodden, not affected by exhaustion or the burden of {mf|his|her} years. Yet, with time, strange rumours began to spread. It was said that not everyone who entered the gates of {mf|his|her} palace on Dargonus would leave again. Envious slander claimed that {name} had acquired a "taste for innocence" in {mf|his|her} later years, and that {mf|he|she} enjoyed consuming the flesh of defenceless victims.

Sparing just a few hours a day for sleep and food, the Rogue Trader worked for the benefit of the downtrodden, not affected by exhaustion or the burden of {mf|his|her} years. Yet, with time, strange rumours began to spread. It was said that not everyone who entered the gates of {mf|his|her} palace on Dargonus would leave again. Envious slander claimed that {name} had acquired a "taste for innocence" in {mf|his|her} later years, and that {mf|he|she} enjoyed consuming the flesh of defenceless victims.

languages.text: 行商浪人为那些被压迫者的利益而战，每天只留几个小时用于睡眠和进食，而且丝毫不会疲劳，也完全没有变老。然而，随着时间推移，古怪的谣言开始生根发芽。人们声称，并非每个进入达戈努斯宫殿大门的人都能离开。人们满怀嫉妒地诽谤{name}，说{mf|他|她}随着年龄的增长，逐渐培养出了“品尝纯真灵魂”的爱好，热衷于吞食那些毫无防备的受害者的血肉。
languages.original_text: Sparing just a few hours a day for sleep and food, the Rogue Trader worked for the benefit of the downtrodden, not affected by exhaustion or the burden of {mf|his|her} years. Yet, with time, strange rumours began to spread. It was said that not everyone who entered the gates of {mf|his|her} palace on Dargonus would leave again. Envious slander claimed that {name} had acquired a "taste for innocence" in {mf|his|her} later years, and that {mf|he|she} enjoyed consuming the flesh of defenceless victims.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人为那些被压迫者的利益而战，每天只留几个小时用于睡眠和进食，而且丝毫不会疲劳，也完全没有变老。然而，随着时间推移，古怪的谣言开始传播。人们声称，并非每个进入达戈努斯宫殿大门的人都能离开。人们满怀嫉妒地诽谤{name}，说{mf|他|她}随着年龄的增长，逐渐养出“品尝纯真”的爱好，喜欢吞食那些毫无防备的受害者的血肉。

languages.text: Unermüdlich schuftete {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} für das Wohl der Bedürftigen. Nur wenige Stunden am Tag gestand {mf|er|sie} sich zum Schlafen und Essen zu, und doch schienen weder die Erschöpfung noch die Last der Jahre {mf|ihm|ihr} jemals zuzusetzen. Doch mit der Zeit machten sonderbare Gerüchte die Runde. Es hieß, dass nicht jeder, der die Tore {mf|seines|ihres} Palastes auf Dargonus betrat, diesen auch wieder verließ. Neider behaupteten, {name} habe in {mf|seinen|ihren} späteren Jahren eine 'Vorliebe für die Unschuld' entwickelt und würde das Fleisch {mf|seiner|ihrer} wehrlosen Opfer essen.
languages.original_text: Sparing just a few hours a day for sleep and food, the Rogue Trader worked for the benefit of the downtrodden, not affected by exhaustion or the burden of {mf|his|her} years. Yet, with time, strange rumours began to spread. It was said that not everyone who entered the gates of {mf|his|her} palace on Dargonus would leave again. Envious slander claimed that {name} had acquired a "taste for innocence" in {mf|his|her} later years, and that {mf|he|she} enjoyed consuming the flesh of defenceless victims.

traits.locale_text: Unermüdlich schuftete {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} für das Wohl der Bedürftigen. Nur wenige Stunden am Tag gestand {mf|er|sie} sich zum Schlafen und Essen zu, und doch schienen weder die Erschöpfung noch die Last der Jahre {mf|ihm|ihr} jemals zuzusetzen. Doch mit der Zeit begannen sonderbare Gerüchte die Runde zu machen. Nicht jeder, der die Tore {mf|seines|ihres} Palastes auf Dargonus betrat, verließ sie auch wieder, so hieß es. Von Neid getrieben verleumdeten die Leute {name}. Sie sagten, {mf|er|sie} habe im Alter "Geschmack an Unschuld" gefunden und verzehre das Fleisch wehrloser Opfer.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} œuvrait sans relâche pour le bien des opprimés, en ne se permettant que quelques heures par jour pour dormir et manger. Pourtant, avec le temps, d'étranges rumeurs se répandirent. On racontait que parmi ceux qui pénétraient dans son palais de Dargonus, certains n'en ressortaient jamais. Les jaloux prétendaient qu'avec l'âge, {name} avait développé un « goût pour l'innocence » et aimait se délecter de la chair de ses victimes sans défense.
languages.original_text: Sparing just a few hours a day for sleep and food, the Rogue Trader worked for the benefit of the downtrodden, not affected by exhaustion or the burden of {mf|his|her} years. Yet, with time, strange rumours began to spread. It was said that not everyone who entered the gates of {mf|his|her} palace on Dargonus would leave again. Envious slander claimed that {name} had acquired a "taste for innocence" in {mf|his|her} later years, and that {mf|he|she} enjoyed consuming the flesh of defenceless victims.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} œuvrait sans relâche pour le bien des opprimés, en ne se permettant que quelques heures par jour pour dormir et manger. Pourtant, avec le temps, d'étranges rumeurs se répandirent. On racontait que parmi ceux qui pénétraient dans son palais de Dargonus, certains n'en ressortaient jamais. Les jaloux prétendaient qu'avec l'âge, {name} avait développé un « goût pour l'innocence » et aimait se délecter de la chair de ses victimes sans défense.

languages.text: Permitiéndose tan solo unas pocas horas al día para dormir y comer, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se dedicó por entero a ayudar a los desfavorecidos, aparentemente inmune al cansancio y al paso de los años. No obstante, con el tiempo empezaron a surgir extraños rumores. Se decía que no todos los que entraban en su palacio de Dargonus volvían a salir. Las acusaciones de los más envidiosos contra {name} afirmaban que con la edad había adquirido un «gusto por la inocencia» y que disfrutaba consumiendo la carne de víctimas indefensas.
languages.original_text: Sparing just a few hours a day for sleep and food, the Rogue Trader worked for the benefit of the downtrodden, not affected by exhaustion or the burden of {mf|his|her} years. Yet, with time, strange rumours began to spread. It was said that not everyone who entered the gates of {mf|his|her} palace on Dargonus would leave again. Envious slander claimed that {name} had acquired a "taste for innocence" in {mf|his|her} later years, and that {mf|he|she} enjoyed consuming the flesh of defenceless victims.

traits.locale_text: Permitiéndose tan solo unas pocas horas al día para dormir y comer, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se dedicó por entero a ayudar a los desfavorecidos, aparentemente inmune al cansancio y al paso de los años. No obstante, con el tiempo empezaron a surgir extraños rumores. Se decía que no todos los que entraban en su palacio de Dargonus volvía a salir. La gente acusaba con envidia a {name}, diciendo que con la edad había adquirido un «gusto por la inocencia» y que disfrutaba consumiendo la carne de víctimas indefensas.

languages.text: 疲労や年齢の蓄積にも影響されることなく、自由開拓者は一日の睡眠と食事に割く数時間を除き、残りの時間を費やして虐げられた人々のために働いた。しかし時が経つにつれ、奇妙な噂が広まり始めた。伝えられるところによると、ダルゴナスの宮殿の門をくぐった者が全員戻ってきているわけではないとのことだ。人々は嫉妬の眼差しを{name}に向け、{mf|彼|彼女}は年とともに「無垢の味」を覚えたことで、無防備な犠牲者の肉を食らうのを楽しんでいるのだと中傷した。
languages.original_text: Sparing just a few hours a day for sleep and food, the Rogue Trader worked for the benefit of the downtrodden, not affected by exhaustion or the burden of {mf|his|her} years. Yet, with time, strange rumours began to spread. It was said that not everyone who entered the gates of {mf|his|her} palace on Dargonus would leave again. Envious slander claimed that {name} had acquired a "taste for innocence" in {mf|his|her} later years, and that {mf|he|she} enjoyed consuming the flesh of defenceless victims.

traits.locale_text: 疲労や年齢の蓄積にも影響されることなく、自由開拓者は一日の睡眠と食事に割く数時間を除き、残りの時間を費やして虐げられた人々のために働いた。しかし時が経つにつれ、奇妙な噂が広まり始めた。伝えられるところによると、ダルゴナスの宮殿の門をくぐった者が全員戻ってきているわけではないとのことだ。人々は嫉妬の眼差しを{name}に向け、{mf|彼|彼女}は年とともに「無垢の味」を覚えたことで、無防備な犠牲者の肉を食らうのを楽しんでいるのだと中傷した。

languages.text: Hür Tacir, uykuya ve yemeğe ayırdığı birkaç saat dışında tüm zamanını, ezilmişlerin yararına yorulmak nedir bilmeden ve yaşının getirdiği yükü umursamadan çalışarak geçirdi. Yine de zamanla tuhaf rivayetler yayılmaya başladı, Dargonus'taki sarayının kapılarından girenlerin bir daha dışarı çıkamadığı söylenir oldu. İlerleyen yıllarda kıskanç iftiracılar; "masumlara düşkün olduğunu" iddia etmeye, savunmasız kurbanlarını yemekten keyif aldığını söylemeye başladı.
languages.original_text: Sparing just a few hours a day for sleep and food, the Rogue Trader worked for the benefit of the downtrodden, not affected by exhaustion or the burden of {mf|his|her} years. Yet, with time, strange rumours began to spread. It was said that not everyone who entered the gates of {mf|his|her} palace on Dargonus would leave again. Envious slander claimed that {name} had acquired a "taste for innocence" in {mf|his|her} later years, and that {mf|he|she} enjoyed consuming the flesh of defenceless victims.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir, uyumaya ve yemek yemeğe ayırdığı birkaç saat dışında tüm zamanını, ezilmişlerin yararına yorulmak nedir bilmeden ve yaşının getirdiği yükü umursamadan çalışarak geçirdi. Yine de zamanla tuhaf söylentiler yayılmaya başladı. Deniliyordu ki Dargonus'taki sarayının kapılarından girenler bir daha dışarı çıkamıyormuş. Kıskanç iftiracılar, ilerleyen yıllarda "masumlara düşkün hâle geldiğini" iddia etmeye, savunmasız kurbanlarının etlerini yemekten keyif aldığını söylemeye başladı.
